data.oai_dc:dc: Coverage breadth matrix used to infer partial and complete gene deletions in field isolates and laboratory reference strains of C. reinhardtii. Coverage breadths are listed for each mRNA in the Creinhardtii_236_gene_exons.gff3 annotation.
single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP)|population genomics|nonsense mutations|loss-of-function|gene deletions|gene gains|presence/absence variation|laboratory evolution
